website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, entry-level table for students and home users.
cons: Headrest doesn’t adjust -- a minor issue for some

customer_reviews.title: Other then that I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have mobility issues and had knee surgery. I needed to do exercise my physical therapist gave me to do at home but could not get on/off the floor. He has exercise tables their so I decided to find me one. I weigh 240lbs so I was very concerned about weight limits but I’ve experienced o problems with that. I am however concerned about ripping leather as it seems thin. I use a sheet to protect leather. Other then that I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: trinkka

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Table for Reiki and Massage Therapist's,
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Table for Reiki and Massage Therapist's, a little heavy if you moving around with it, but well constructed. The bag is a definite plus and I like the two head and foot rolls. There are other much more expensive tables out there, but I am very happy with this model. Easy set up if you used to setting up a table like this, and if not; you learn fast how to do it. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: A good table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good table for the money. I am a massage therapist and use this one as my "out call" table. So far, it has held together nicely and traveled well. It is light weight and fits in my trunk perfectly! My clients tell me that they are comfortable on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s not horrible for the price. You get what you pay for I guess. I was happy with the size and overall look and feel of the table, but the both latches don’t close. I’m a professional licensed massage therapist and have had many tables. I purchased this table for a clients that have me visit them on a weekly basis. The table doesn’t have to travel with me stays at there home. If I had to travel with this table then it would be garbage as useless. So this is why I’m giving it only two stars
customer_reviews.author: Lmtlove

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: There are much more rugged massage tables on the market, but for the price point, you simply can't beat the value of this product. Good for occasional use, but I wouldn't recommend it for a working/traveling professional massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a very awesome table! I was concerned with how sturdy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very awesome table! I was concerned with how sturdy it would be for the price but it's very well built and the headrest is easy to remove and insert. Nice adjustable height feature. The armrest is neat! This is a great massage table!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So Far It's Been Great
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 9 months, and it's been great! Very comfortable. It looks a little flimsy, but I weigh 240 pounds, and there have been no problems with me on the table. I had another face rest which we bought previously, and we use that one. So far we are very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: MJD2013

customer_reviews.title: Everything else was great. It's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The reason I didn't give this massage table a 5 star rating is bc you can not use the face cradle on both sides. You can only use the face cradle on one side of the table. Most massage tables have holes on each side of the table but this particular massage table does NOT! Everything else was great. It's comfortable, and lightweight. I really like it, otherwise. I just wish I knew about the table not have the face cradle holes on each side. I wouldn't have purchased it. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: JulietteLMT

customer_reviews.title: I got the table around Aug however the table broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the table around Aug however the table broke. the client went to flip over on his stomach and the whole side snapped and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a "physical therapy" table like they have at my physical therapist...trying to do various exercises with dumbbells on a bed just wasn't cutting it. Table is nice and sturdy, adjusting the height is super easy, and set-up was a breeze, even for my arthritic body!
customer_reviews.author: K. Black

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy and not too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new bed! I like that it’s soft comfortable and cushy compared to other tables. It’s not too heavy to carry. I will be using it for facials and lashing the only thing I will have to determine is how comfortable it will be for me because I can’t put my legs under the table very well. Overall, I am happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: jojo07

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide, soft and cushiony. Great take for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the money. Nice and wide. Adjustable height. Held two guys (390 pounds) on top without a problem. Does have a strong (plastic) smell at first, but does not last too much. Has enough cushioning and the adjustable headrest makes for a comfortable laydown.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Moving legs
customer_reviews.text: I think its a very good bed but i feel mine its not 100% stable, legs are moving sometimes and Im really affraid its gonna move some day and I can hurt the customer especially that Im working on a eyelashes.... ;/ dont want to make a bad review because i think its really great but that issue its serious. Would like to contact with seller how to fix that problem
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good for mobile work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter bed or mobile bed for going to people homes for reiki or massage practice. For the rpice it can not be beat. I will use this for going to peoples homes but I suggest a getting one on the next price range up or so, for having at a stable pratice.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Needs extra padding, otherwise it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Great design, nice & lightweight, good carrying case... The only drawback is the foam cushion. 😞 It’s soft & fluffy, seems great- but when my clients flip over to supine they comment that their tailbone & hips sink down to the wood board & they’re no longer comfy. A thicker (not taller) sturdier foam pad would be the only thing I would change.
customer_reviews.author: Clover J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Compared to many other massage tables, this was a great quality product for a truly great price. I was purchasing this for my father, who is a licensed professional therapist. He was looking for a massage table with bolsters for the client's legs. I read reviews before ordering and was a bit skeptic. One review said the removable face cradle did not fit the massage table. However, when my father received the product we can see that the all parts of the item fit perfectly. Shipping was also very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: IronTank

customer_reviews.title: Fantasy Table
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Set up was easy. This table is very sturdy and provides a great platform for massages. The height adjustment process is extremely easy. We have had three other tables and non have held up to daily use....thus far this one is great.....its a reliability fantasy come true.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Moss

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get for this price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these they are sturdy and have a great carrying case, I worry that this table wont support the weight it says because some of the heavier people who use it say it feels like the legs are folding in when they sit on it. But for the price, i don't know if you could get better
customer_reviews.author: Amy d.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy reliable table. My girlfriend and I use it to give each other massages. The table is way more sturdier than I thought it would be. I’m 6’0 230. It holds me very well. I turn over and there’s no wobbling or any issues that concerns me or her. Very good table. It folds and stores easy. Great product. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: OldSchool

customer_reviews.title: Assembles with NO Tools
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Black with wooden supports looks attractive. Cable supports underneath add to the strength. Could not imagine a better table at a professional's establishment. Very light weight so can be dragged into position by someone who is elderly—in is the case for whom it was purchased. Rods for arm and head supports look like that could have made them at least an inch longer, but still extremely functional. All cushions that are included add to the feel that you've purchased a great model.
customer_reviews.author: CDkins

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and even better quality
customer_reviews.text: Was super surprised on how well built this was. I have had and used more $ tables, that were suppose to be better quality and this stands up to those. Table is light and sturdy, and cushion is comfortable. If your looking for a portable table for a great price don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: A great table made better by perfect customer service
customer_reviews.text: First, I've had this now for about 18 months. It's a good build quality given that it's also portable, and the quality of the padding is great for people at a reasonable (<250lb) weight. It's big, so portability is relative, but it's easy to move around and feels stable / solid. Even better than the table has been the customer service: an arm broke early on (totally my fault) & they sent me a new one. It's a great table, I'd buy it again if I needed to, but the way it's shaping up it doesn't look like I will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I am a physical therapist looking for a temporary table until construction is complete in my clinic. This table arrived two days ago, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the look and quality of the table. It is very comfortable and the edge is nicely protected by the foam and vinyl, which is important when you are stretching the patient with their legs dropped of the edge of the table. The bolsters are also a plus. It is difficult to stand up and move around by one person, as it does not lock once opened, but all in all this is a great table and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jarreau

customer_reviews.title: decent table, jokey bolster
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed because it looked great in the picture. The bolster (one of the reasons I bought this particular model) is half the length of a normal bolster, meaning it will support one ankle, but not both (who thought of this??). The table is OK, especially for the money, but it's not wide enough for many clients. I do not think I am keeping this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a masseuse but wanted to get this for when I give massages to my husband when he overworks his muscles. I was surprised at the quality of this considering the price. It's sturdy yet portable, so I can set it up to use it and take it down and store it away in its case afterwards. I don't have to have a place to dedicated to having a bed set up. Since it's so affordable any one can get it, but I feel it is sturdy enough to serve the professional as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shon Borneman

customer_reviews.title: We use it every weekend
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i massage each other every weekend - and we are so glad our massage-therapist friend recommended we get our own table! It saves our backs, and makes it really feel like a spa experience. We don't really use the bag or most of the bolsters - and we ended up getting a different head piece that was adjustable at the local massage supply store. The table folds away nicely, feels sturdy and is light enough that I can carry it - but we don't try to move it / set it up alone (would scrape our hardwood floors).
customer_reviews.author: Human#1192874193457

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The table is well made and perfectly sized. My previous table was three times this amount and only came with the headrest. The shoulder slides are a very nice improvement over the standard table as well as the hanging arm rest. It has more than enough room for a very large person and didn't even sigh at a 270 lbs. man. Very nice carrying case, internal storage was well thought out. I would recommend this product to the experienced or novice massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Tralean

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. Not overly big, very squishy and comfortable. Easy to clean. Works perfectly for me. I use it for eyelash extensions! Very impressed for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Despain

customer_reviews.title: Not enough padding
customer_reviews.text: I helped my massage therapist get a new table to quickly replace her table that had broken. This came quickly. It was lighter than her old one so it was easier to carry. However, the padding is lacking. If you roll over, it is painful to the hips. I noticed this as did her other clients. It did work for the time she needed to buy a better and more comfortable table. The price is right but should only be used in a pinch due to the lack of comfort provided by the table top padding and the face piece padding.
customer_reviews.author: selrn

customer_reviews.title: Great table and great price
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist comes to my home and I felt sorry for her always having to carry her heavy table so I decided to purchase one. Great table and great price. My massage therapist was quite happy with the quality and ease of breaking it down to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is for home use and we are very happy with this table. Would've liked a larger knee bolster, but happy with the purchase and definitely the price. We have adjusted the table height, carried it up and down our stairs a few time and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EpicuriousByNature

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality item. The legs do not lock, the foam is thin, the vinyl covering looks like it would tear easily and it is extremely heavy. The screws in the legs that should allow you to raise and lower the table were jammed so far into the wood it was impossible to remove them. The worst of the worst.
customer_reviews.author: JM Reid

customer_reviews.title: NARROW, BUT CAPABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This table is actually pretty solid. It serves its purpose well, easy to carry along and I like that i can store a lot of the extra items under and within the table. It is a standard size, so wider individuals may feel...the lack on wideth, but leaner indivduals, should feel just fine. I have done Massages, Stretch techniques, facials, and waxings on this table, it’s a keeper. So once my studio expands it will still be around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: 4 year update still a great table. It gets used about 2-4 times a month and still going strong haven’t had a single problem m, if I n ended to inwould get another. My wife has wanted a table for a while. I ordered this one for her for her birthday she loves it. Works great, folds up nice. I would recommend it to anyone. Its easy to store when your not using it and we like how everything fits inside of it when folder (minus the 2 Semi-Circle Bolsters).
customer_reviews.author: MEReView

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my son, who broke his neck at age 21...Unfortunately he committed suicide January of 2018 at the young age of 53! But, a nice older gentleman bought it for his wife and her massage therapist...and they are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for support
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently developed severe lower back pain. A specialist recommended she do basic core strengthening exercises. There was no way for her to do them on the floor and the bed failed to provide a firm enough surface. After much searching and discussing, I bought her this table. It is sturdy enough to not only hold her weight but remain steady while she is in motion with her various exercises. Her back condition is improving steadily. Who knows, once it is resolved, I may use it to giver her a massage as well!
customer_reviews.author: John B. Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Massage Table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who is a professional masseuse. She loved it! She inspected it and said that it was very firm but comfortable, she loved the fact that it came with additional bolsters. She was really impressed with the quality of this massage table, she is around 4'11" and didn't have a problem opening the table on her own. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: L. R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We had shopped at costco and some other online places for a bit to find a table that fit our needs and we settled on this one based on the reviews and the pricing. Couldn't be happier. I am not a little guy , around 250 pounds, and the table is sturdy for me on it with no sway or give. The ease of storage is great and assembly is well you unfold it and lock the legs. Its a great table for the money and we would definitely recommend it to anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: JLC20948347

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Seems sturdy construction, only used it 3 times so far but I anticipate this is a great purchase for the price. We don't use the arm extensions. The head extension is comfortable. Also don't usually use the flat piece under the head rest which is suppose to be a place you can place your hands and rest them during massage. You might use these extras if you have a larger person. It folds up easy for closet storage. It is easy to adjust the height as well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd E. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Even my Therapist's uses this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe back injuries two multi level spinal fusions and when my Ocupational and Physical Therapist's started to do table work instead of bringing their they used mine saying it was the same as theirs or better. I believe them. It supported my full weight and my rather tall not so gentle Therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sorensen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this table
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this table for 3 months and it has already cracked. This table said it can hold up to a certain amount of pounds and it cracked when only 200 lbs were on the table. The wood is cheap. Everything about this table is cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, but it makes noise...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this table is light and portable, but I have reservations as to its construction. I have heard some loud cracks when some of my larger clients are getting on or off the table, none of whom have been near the weight limit though. I have inspected the table afterwards to find no signs of damage to the table, so maybe its just "settling" like a new house? Anyway, the price is good, and the table is comfy.
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Solid table. Folds up very easily for storage. I bought this table to be used for PT after shoulder surgery. It has paid for itself 10 fold with my wife doing the stretches instead of going to PT for these 6 weeks at $40 per session. I can't believe the price, it's a great deal. I expected to have to assemble it for this price but I was very happy to see it show up already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Prognosis

customer_reviews.title: Great Table... But, skip the accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Perfect massage table! Great price! I use it to give my woman massages ALL the time! EAsy to take up and take down! Plus this one comes with all the necessary accessories... BUT, to be honest... if you're just doing this non-professionally... and, you wanna save a few bucks... you don't need the extra accessories... my lady doesn't use them... and they take extra effort and space trying to pack things back up.
customer_reviews.author: HaileSelassie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a light weight table but a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jene Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Padding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two of these tables a year ago and after 5 months of using the padding is completely gone. All of my patient's complain about how hard the table is to lay on. Would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Checchi

customer_reviews.title: Great massage table.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this table! I was skeptical with such a good price, but am not disappointed with the purchase. It looks great - does not look cheap, easy to put up and take down, adjustable for height, and definitely lives up to it's weight rating. I would certainly buy another one if I was in the market. I also ordered the sheets that Amazon suggested with it and they are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Penewise

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table for my use (non professional). Top padding is thick enough to be comfortable with just a sheet over it. Very portable. I recommend getting a longer bolster and one of the fleece headrest covers, plus some Biotone advanced therapy lotion.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Not just for massages there are multiple uses for this table. My wife uses it to do eyelash extensions and she loves it. It is c
customer_reviews.text: Not just for massages there are multiple uses for this table. My wife uses it to do eyelash extensions and she loves it. It is comfortable and professional. I would recommend it to anyone doing any type of professional service.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Heck, for occasional use at home it is unbeatable. It has held up under the weight of two people (if you know what I mean) the attachments are a little cheap but functions fine.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to do physical therapy for my 8year old handicap daughter. I was very skeptical at first due to the low price but thought I'd take a chance since it is priced low and wouldn't be out an exorbitant amount of money if unhappy. WOW! To my surprise this massage tabe is AWESOME!! It is very sturdy and works great for our needs. My little girl loves it and makes her physical therapy easier. I weigh 200lbs and I layed on it to insure stability before I would put my daughter on it and it holds me very well and stable. I would recommend this table!!! Thank you G-James & Elle
customer_reviews.author: James Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good table.
customer_reviews.text: I used this table for facials and waxing. It was easy to travel with, easy set up and not super bulky. I can see where some people would want one that looks more sturdy but I had people all shapes and sizes on this table and I never had a problem. Good price, great quality. If your looking for a great message table but don't want to spend a lot of money this would be the one.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Good starter table.
customer_reviews.text: The table is great for a new student who is just starting out in an MT program. It is pretty lightweight yet sturdy. (I have had a max of 250 lbs on the table so I cant vouch for anything higher) I do feel it is slightly narrower than I would like it to be but for basic Swedish techniques, it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my physical therapy at home following injury; excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this table
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this table. It's comfortable as is, but I still added a memory foam on top. It's super comfortable now. Everyone has had positive things to say about it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Desert gal

customer_reviews.title: This is great worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It is not a professional table like in the parlor. It works just fine for the occasional massage. It will not hold two people. The plywood it is made from is a bit thin. Again this is not a professional table. It doesn't cost 500.00 either. If you are using this at home buy it worth every penny. It pays for itself after 1 massage. If you are going to travel and give massages every week with this table it is not for you. Don't be cheap buy a professional table made from marine grade plywood. It will weigh three times what this thing weights.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace radge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I choose this rating due to the construction of the product. The table arrived in a timely fashion. The table is very professional looking and very comfortable. We have tried out the table and we love it. The only thing we do not like are the pegs (or whatever you call them) that support the arm pads on the side. If you put down any considerable weight they will break ( should have been metal not wood).
customer_reviews.author: David L. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table that is lightweight, yet fully adjustable. The accessories store easily inside the table when folded up. Very stable when setup, doesn't shake or squeak when on the table.
customer_reviews.author: SB101v2

customer_reviews.title: My family and client love this table
customer_reviews.text: I am a Young Living Distributor 1381433 and practice Raindrop on my family and clients. I have been using this table since I completed my Raindrop training and they love it. I like the fact that it is light and easily portable, but sturdy enough to hold over 300 pounds. The carrying case works well, and is easy to get on and off of the unit. Price is good for unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy @ YL Gathering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect massage table
customer_reviews.text: The table is easy to put up & take down. It is a comfortable height from the ground &, has soft comfortable padding. It fits perfectly into the carry-bag &, has extra room within the bag to place extra pads, sheets, etc. It is also easy to get into/out of my car &, isn't incredibly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing at this price. My partners (lol) love it......and it adjusts- it's sturdy and portable. I move it out of the way easily when not in use and put in the closet. Best be careful with the adjustable leg screw downs, since they are plastic and potentially cross thread when readjusting... but they are extremely sturdy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MeteoManMusic

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at all the other massage tables, but most of them are either too expensive or too badly rated. But looking at this one, it is reasonably priced and is a good quality massage table! I definitely recommend buying it if you are looking for a reasonably priced and excellent quality massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I received this table and it was exactly as advertised. The package arrived on time and in great shape. The table is very easy to put together and use. It is also very easy to close back up and store away when not using. It is sturdy and my wife tells me it is very, very comfortable. It is a bit bulky to carry when taking it somewhere. But that is to be expected given the quality of this piece. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very will built
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use this quite a bit now. Its very sturdy and well made. Cant go wrong with this table.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: This table is very comfortable and solid
customer_reviews.text: This table is very comfortable and solid. I do recommend it to couples and save the money going to get a massage from strangers......if you are single ..just lay on the table and wish you had a partner....great product..for the price
customer_reviews.author: HAYWARD W.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever and one of the most favorite gifts ...
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever and one of the most favorite gifts my husband and I ever got for each other. Very nice table. Easily can adjust height. Sturdy. Easy to walk around to change position without taking your hands off your spouse. It's amazing how much easier it is to massage with the right equipment. Table is permanently set up in our home and is used 4-5 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Langdon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I just got this table and it is fantastic quality for the price. It works great. Only thing is it smells like gasoline. The off gassing from the foam is horrible. It isn't a problem for use as the sheets and candles mask any odor but for the last 3 days when I come in the room first thing in the morning it is thick. I can only hope this passes with time.
customer_reviews.author: Blake H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I do not practice massage for a living but I did go to school for it, I just bought a table for friends, family, and my spouse. Since it wasn't for professional use or profit, I didn't want to spend a whole lot. I chose this table and it is amazing. You would have thought I spent $500 or more. They didn't even have this great a quality when I was in school. I definitely recommend this table whether you use it for friends and family or for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: mistyag

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this table for several weeks now. It arrived ahead of scheduled date. Product performs very well. It was easy to assemble. I do not take it anywhere, but portability would not be a problem. Comfort level is really good and face rest is comfortable. I am not sure product is "leather"; more like" leatherette"; but appears durable and again it is very comfortable. Accessories are as promised. This product is well worth the money and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: lynnette

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the table was different than advertised and than the one I had ordered previously. It lacked the expansion arms, which were also in the brochure that was with the table. I would have returned it however I needed to use it immediately upon arrival. The rest of the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: grammymammy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Not Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness of this table (due to a lightweight wood composite that serves as the base, I think) and that it's light enough that I can carry it from place to place without too much struggle. The vinyl covering is not thin or flimsy, as far as I can tell and should hold up well if used properly. I think I'm going to enjoy owning it!
customer_reviews.author: Kali Dass

customer_reviews.title: But this was a great buy for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying a massage table from Sierra Comfort. My last table lasted me about 4 years, eventually you have to get a new one because the padding goes flatter over time. But this was a great buy for an affordable price. And the table is really light, you can travel with it easily.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great and not too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price. The attachments aren't the best but the table itself is pretty nice, cleans easily, and it's comfortable. One of the better tables on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm now a pro!
customer_reviews.text: Want to have a pro massage table in the house? I bought this because my wife and I were getting weekly massages and we thought it would be nice to have our own table vice the crappy one they bought to the house well this works amazing. It's easy to hide under virtually everything.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Sturdy and easy to set-up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Hotwifey195486

customer_reviews.title: Great value for home use
customer_reviews.text: We have been using a couple weeks. Delivery was quick, table is light an stows under our couch easily. We bought as valentines gift for the whole family and this table is great for our family use. 6'4 husband fits fine and the fact it came with the basic accessories makes it a great deal. We're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DawnTell

customer_reviews.title: Sierra Comfort Massage Table
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this massage table surpassed my expectations. This is a great product for the low price. I'm sure it will give me many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: steven wolfe

customer_reviews.title: good for home
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and I to trade off massages. Nice table good price. A little cheaply made and I am super careful with the legs when it is on its side as they are flimsy. But once upright pretty solid, and not worried about breaking or anything. We have gotten good use out of it and it is holding up fine. had about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new table!
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, you can't go wrong. The ease of setup and where it's portable, the stability is perfect. I think it's just the table I need for Reiki sessions, which require light wear & tear. I advise anyone with a budget and gentle use to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: roscogirl

customer_reviews.title: product is sturdy and great for price
customer_reviews.text: product is sturdy and great for price. be mindful of the width. it is only 28" as they clearly state. it is too narrow for those i am helping, especially the males their shouldersvarev almost flush with the table
customer_reviews.author: hiilani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came with more stuff then I expected like a half bolster,oil container,arm rest for the sides,face cradle over and sheet plus the table is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Mozee

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise table for those that can't easly get up on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: This massage table worked out very well for our needs. My wife needed to do her exercises but had difficulty getting up off the floor once she completed her exercises because of arthritis in her knees. The table legs are adjustable to a sitting height which allowed her to do her exercises on the table and and easy transition to a standing position.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a great size and comfy. Set up was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Table is very light, easy to set up and fits my needs perfectly. I am an athletic trainer and use this predominantly at the rugby pitch for tapping, stretching and evaluation of injuries. It's had held up in the rain twice so far this season. I just make sure to dry it out afterwards. Cons: Carry bag is very thin and easily tears. Cushion on top of table is also thin. Maybe uncomfortable if on it for long periods of time. Clasps that hold table closed when folded are not very durable and some times difficult to maneuver. Not as sturdy as more expensive brands for bigger folks. Some of my bigger players cause it to sway a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: This table is excellent for the money. I bought the one with the thicker padding and its comfortable. Easy set up and take down. Nice case included. I would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: BanjoBob33

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: So far this table is pretty tough. I'm a 270 lb Bodybuilder and this thing hold up to me very well. A good deal here on Amazon. It did take forever to get it but thats not Amazons fault. It came from china. Quality looks pretty good and you get quite a few things for your money. case, pads, armrest etc.
customer_reviews.author: BIG-E

customer_reviews.title: Great personal massage table.
customer_reviews.text: I got this over a year ago, and it's the best anniversary gift I ever got us. We use it regularly, and it's still sturdy and holds me (6'4" 260) just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzyroo

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use, but wouldnt select for a professional table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day later than what was guaranteed, but I called amazon customer support and they settled the concern. Table is easy to use, easy to pack away. however, seems like if you aren't careful when folding it up you could crack some of the thin pieces of wood underneath.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pro

customer_reviews.title: Table does its job. However, the table bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Table does its job. However, the table bag is cheap - it broke after me having the table for 2 weeks. I am a traveling PT and now have to carry it without the strap or single handle as they both have broken, and I have had it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Really light weight and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really light weight and easy to set up. I keep it in the back of my car for my clients that I visit in their homes. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Living Conscious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for Reiki.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and set up in a matter of minutes. Weight of table I am able to manage given I cannot life very much. I gave a client a Full Body Reiki Treatment a few hours after set up and they liked the table saying it was comfortable and she felt very secure on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for tattooing!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, sturdy, with easy set up and tear down, I use it for tattooing, and has made my life 1000x easier.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Mick

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the affordable price
customer_reviews.text: My mom uses it for our family and also for outside clients- it has adjustable height - which is great, as you can select what works best for your height. Leather quality is very good. Soft. The inserts (for the head, legs,arms) are a great addition. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for a great table, along with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Does everything I want and dirt cheap. Probably not the lightest table ever, but light enough. The zipper on the carry bag broke some after I got it, but I didn't contact them about it until 5 months later. They quickly sent me a new bag - So great customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Chertov

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table about 3 months ago and it has worked very well in our day spa. For a product that's reasonably priced the craftsmanship is excellent. Recently the headrest locking mechanism accidentally broke off (probably due to over-tightening). I contacted the company about getting a replacement part, and they sent me a whole new headrest base by overnight mail. Now, that's what I call Customer Service. I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Malek

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect massage table, set up is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TABLE at an INCREDIBLE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME TABLE at an INCREDIBLE PRICE! This is high quality, precision, massage portability with convenience, fashion, and all at an extraordinary price!!! Can imagine why there'd be anything but 5-Star reviews on this baby!
customer_reviews.author: Adele Rey Productions

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came with what picture showed. Holds up to 375 lbs or more
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this table!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous ordering a massage table on-line because I had heard horror stories about the quality. This is my first massage table and I am so happy with this table! It is sturdy, light enough for me to carry, easy to set up and take down, large enough to be comfortable for everyone and it was inexpensive. I am very pleased with this table and I have saved this seller to return to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Sonier

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for my husband to use for his mobile massaging. The table is very sturdy. Love the carry bag. The bag is roomy enough for all items for the table and extras! Is setup and take done. Easy to clean, and for those on a budget, a twin fitted sheet fits perfect for the table. I would suggest buying the head/face rest covers though. Great product at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

product_meta.title: Sierra Comfort Professional Series
product_meta.description: The Sierra Comfort SC-601 Sooth Portable Massage Table is made of sturdy Beech hardwood with 2.5 inches of high density foam for a deluxe massage experience. This package includes an ergonomically designed half-round bolster for additional comfort and support. The bolster conform to the body’s natural curves and are filled with high density foam for durability. Clients will enjoy the included adjustable face cradle that can be easily positioned. A forward arm rest is also included. You can carry your massage table conveniently in the zippered carry case that is also provided with this product.
feature_bullets: Includes Semi-circle bolster, carry bag, disposable face sheets, adjustable face cradle and arm shelf.
2.5 inch Luxe high-density foam for the ultimate massage experience
Measures 72 by 28 inches (L x W); height adjustable from 23-32 inches
Durable PU leather is waterproof & oil-resistant
